channel.title: Python on Daniel Alcaide
channel.description: Recent content in Python on Daniel Alcaide

item.title: From 1,500 traders to 6 elite: Financial risk analysis system with Databricks and Python
item.description: On social trading platforms like eToro, investors can copy the strategies of experienced traders. However, most users focus solely on profitability, ignoring the associated risk. This project addresses precisely that problem.
